footer.blurb: Professional urgent care after accidents with bilingual support.

seo.title: Accident ER – Urgent Care MD | Accident-Focused Urgent Care
seo.description: Patient-focused urgent care after accidents—evaluation, diagnostics, and guidance with bilingual support.

hero.title: Accident-focused urgent care
hero.subtitle: Calm, thorough medical evaluation after collisions, workplace incidents, and sports injuries.
hero.safetyNote: If you or someone else is experiencing a life-threatening emergency, call 911.

intro.title: Here for you after an accident
intro.text: Clinicians provide careful assessment, on-site diagnostics, and clear next steps so you can move forward confidently. Serving Utah.

afterAccident.title: After an accident: what to do

steps.title: Ensure safety
steps.text: Move to a safe area and check for serious symptoms.

steps.title: Call 911 for emergencies
steps.text: If there are severe injuries, trouble breathing, heavy bleeding, or confusion, call 911.

steps.title: Seek medical evaluation
steps.text: Visit Accident ER – Urgent Care MD for a thorough exam and appropriate testing.

points.title: Accident-focused expertise
points.text: Experienced clinicians evaluating injuries from crashes, falls, and impacts.

points.title: On-site diagnostics
points.text: X-ray and point-of-care testing to guide timely decisions.

points.title: Clear communication
points.text: Straightforward explanations, bilingual support, and coordinated follow-up.

points.title: Efficient care
points.text: Streamlined visits that prioritize what you need.

closingCTA.title: Ready when you are
closingCTA.text: Walk-in visits are welcome, and appointments are available. Bring any accident reports or prior imaging if you have them.

tagline.title: Let us help you Feel Better Faster at AccidentER®
tagline.subtitle: Our goal is to provide quality care and get you in and out as quickly as possible.

seo.title: Services | Accident ER – Urgent Care MD
seo.description: Accident care services: evaluation, diagnostics, and follow-up for injury-related concerns. Browse services and find appropriate care.

hero.title: Accident care services
hero.subtitle: Overview of evaluations and treatments after accidents—explore services and find the right care.

intro.title: Understand your options
intro.text: Explore services for injuries after motor vehicle collisions, workplace incidents, and sports activities. Serving patients across Utah.

howToChoose.title: How to choose a service
howToChoose.text: If unsure, start with Accident Medical Evaluation or contact our team to match your needs.

closingCTA.title: Walk-in welcome
closingCTA.text: You can walk in or plan a visit. Bring accident reports or prior imaging if available.

seo.title: About | Accident ER – Urgent Care MD
seo.description: About Accident ER – patient-first, accident-focused urgent care in Utah.

hero.title: About AccidentER®
hero.subtitle: Accident‑focused urgent care designed for clarity, safety, and support.

mission.title: Our mission
mission.text: Provide careful evaluation after accidents, clear communication, and practical next steps—respecting your time and safety.

ourTeam.title: Our team
ourTeam.text: A collective of clinicians and staff focused on accident care—working together to deliver consistent, bilingual support.

howWeCare.title: How we care
howWeCare.text: Organized steps designed for safety, clarity, and timely decisions.

items.title: Compassion
items.text: Empathetic care that prioritizes your safety.

items.title: Efficiency
items.text: Streamlined visits that respect your time.

closingCTA.title: Ready when you are
closingCTA.text: Walk‑in visits are welcome, and appointments are available. Bring any accident reports or prior imaging if you have them.

seo.title: FAQ | Accident ER – Urgent Care MD
seo.description: Frequently asked questions about walk-ins, bilingual care, and when to call 911.

hero.title: Frequently Asked Questions
hero.subtitle: Short answers about visiting Accident ER – Urgent Care MD in Utah.

items.question: Do you accept walk-ins?
items.answer: Yes. Walk-ins are welcome during posted hours.

items.question: Do you evaluate concussions?
items.answer: Yes. We provide concussion and mild TBI evaluation.

items.question: Do you provide bilingual care?
items.answer: Yes. English and Spanish support are available.

items.question: When should I call 911?
items.answer: For life-threatening emergencies (severe bleeding, trouble breathing, confusion), call 911.

seo.title: Contact | Accident ER – Urgent Care MD
seo.description: Contact Accident ER – Urgent Care MD in Utah. Call, get directions, or view hours.

hero.title: Contact Accident ER – Urgent Care MD
hero.subtitle: One clinic location in Utah providing accident-focused urgent care.
hero.safetyNote: If this is a medical emergency, call 911.

form.title: Send us a message
form.privacyNote: By submitting, you agree to be contacted about your inquiry.
form.successMessage: Thank you. We will follow up as soon as possible.
form.errorMessage: There was an issue sending your message. Please try again.

map.title: Find us
map.parkingNoteText: Parking details and arrival instructions here. Please arrive a few minutes early.
directionsItems: Enter from 900 E and follow signage to AccidentER®
Free on‑site parking available near the main entrance
Look for green AccidentER® branding at the clinic entry
